content: I am newly getting these errors that I never have before causing IG not to publish. :

IG must include a definition parameter with a code of 'releaselabel'. Value can be 'CI build' or some other status.
IG must include a definition parameter with a code of 'copyrightyear'. Value can be '2020+' (This is in the MCC IG
When I add them in ToF considers them errors.
